id.story: 陈 was a Túyàngan street rat in Kausao, rescued from attackers by a martial artist who became her Shīfu (師父), training her in Ghost Serpent style and inducting her into the Jianghu (江湖). He is remembered by her with rose-colored glasses, ignoring his flaws (to be specified in greater detail as we play). He was also murdered; details TBD. 陈 now works as domestic staff, making the highty-toighty rounds, searching for his killer.

aspects.aspect: Witnessed the Murder of her Shīfu
